function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of complete assessment of cytotoxicity for antiviral materials","Impact":"Potential toxicity and harm to human health","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough assessment of cytotoxicity and toxicity testing before widespread use","Technologies":"Advanced toxicity testing methods and control measures","People":"Researchers, manufacturers, and end users","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Unpredictable bacterial and viral infections","Impact":"Potential for widespread disease outbreaks and public health crises","Mitigation":"Invest in research for antimicrobial activity and targeted applications of antiviral materials","Technologies":"Advanced antimicrobial testing methods and surveillance systems","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Need for treatments and approaches to combat specific viral proteins","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases and public health crisis","Mitigation":"Identify and develop treatments to block specific viral proteins and exterminate viruses","Technologies":"Advanced antiviral technologies and medical research","People":"Medical researchers, healthcare professionals, and public health authorities","Owner":"Medical research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
